title: Gator Got Her
description: Paula Decker is a feisty young NYC diner waitress. An accidentalmisstep on the way home one night lands her chained to a wall in the watery sewer lair of the Gator Man! He cannot speak but communicates his lust-filled desires in other ways, forcing Paula to overcome her fear and revulsion of the creature as she submits to his unexpectedly arousing advances.
author: Maxine Cordry
